cleaned_text: [ ](/us/products/all-purpose-seasoning/vegeta-no-msg-added) Vegeta NO MSG added All purpose seasoning Vegeta Natur an all-natural, gluten and lactose free all purpose seasoning blended from carefully selected vegetables and spices. Vegeta Natur contains no preservatives, artificial flavor enhancers or MSG. Don't sacrifice flavor in the interest of health. With Vegeta Natur, you can have both. Vegeta Natur is the right choice for you. It was designed in response to the growing consumer awareness and the need for healthy and natural food. This innovation in food seasonings is fully in accordance with the trends of healthy nutrition, prepared from vegetables grown under the sun and without additives. Vegeta Natur's values: We've prepared fun little quizzes for you with which you will discover recipes that best fit your mood. Once you've solved them, enjoy a range of fine dishes for your current and future hungry emotions.
